originalTitle: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
title: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
content: Almost 30 years after he died, the Nigerian will posthumously receive a Lifetime Achievement Award.

originalTitle: Burkina Faso junta announces ban on all political parties
title: Burkina Faso junta announces ban on all political parties
content: The multiparty system had been "promoting division among citizens", the country's interior minister said.

title: Suspected jihadists attack airport near Niger's capital
content: Niger's defence ministry said four military personnel were injured and 20 attackers killed in the incident.

title: Alcaraz beats Zverev to break slam record in reaching Australian Open final
content: Carlos Alcaraz becomes the youngest man to reach all four slam finals and can now become youngest to win all four.

originalTitle: Teenager Flagg breaks 46-year NBA points record but Hornets beat Mavericks
title: Teenager Flagg breaks 46-year NBA points record but Hornets beat Mavericks
content: Cooper Flagg scores 49 points, the most by a teenager in a single NBA game, but Charlotte Hornets beat Dallas Mavericks.

originalTitle: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
title: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
content: The US president says he has told Iran it has to do "two things" to avoid military action, as the US builds up its forces in the Gulf.

originalTitle: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
title: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
content: Ukraine's Air Force said regions near the front line had been targeted by drones and a ballistic missile overnight.

title: Panama voids Hong Kong-based firm's canal port contracts
content: The move follows Donald Trump's previous claim the US was taking the crucial Panama canal "back" from China.
